title: Bard Bug
body: Last game, i played nasus, etc etc blah blah blah, bard on the enemy team ulted his inner mid tower it remained untargetable for the rest of the game,  has anyone else got this bug? and quick fix please it contributed towards the loss of the game

replies.body:
Amazing.

Bloody amazing.

Can the tower still shoot? Oh yeah, you should report it [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
I just had this happen to me... What a load of crap!
